content: this is a digital download and not an actual product this pattern is written for beginners pattern details… pattern shows you how to crochet… vines 2 kinds of leaves spirals wisteria lots on images to assist with pattern creation check out our youtube for videos to help with most of our patterns including this one there is a facebook group title fleeting obsessions patterns this page is for pattern owners only it is a place to share images of your creations and ask questions freely please join us 2 fleeting obsessions patterns | facebook please note pattern does not include how to create any of the pattern tester results materials needed 100 - 200 yards depending on size size g 4 00 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do may change amount of row needed sewing needle and thread polyfil stuffing or alternative and wire 16 gauge or thicker stitch marker square space will ask you for your address its part of the checkout process i cannot see this info and i cannot change that it asks you are welcome to grab the pattern from ravelry if you desire materials needed size 5 00 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do yarn used in images various scrap green yarns mostly big twist brand stitch guide us terms chain chain magic_ring magic_ring/circle slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet stitch trpc triple/treble_crochet picot picot stitch increase increase decrease decrease please read all pattern notes - they are important and were included for specific assistance throughout the build if you have questions about the pattern please read through all notes first before submitting a request for assistance disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below watch out for us on any of our socials for tutorial videos and pattern assistance subscribe to our email mailing list for up to date stitch guides as well social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube @fleetingobsessionsart
